warrior_label.tooltip: Any Branch, Tag-Name, or Commit-ID of the Warrior Repository

warrior_dest.tooltip: Path to the directory in which Warrior should be cloned

warrior_clean_install.tooltip: When set to 'yes', it would delete the existing Warrior repository on your system and clone it anew

katana_label.tooltip: Any Branch, Tag-Name, or Commit-ID of the Katana Repository

katana_dest.tooltip: Path to the directory in which Katana should be cloned

katana_clean_install.tooltip: When set to 'yes', it would delete the existing Katana repository on your system and clone it anew

katana_clone.tooltip: When set to 'no', Katana won't be cloned

kw_repo_label.tooltip: Any Branch, Tag-Name, or Commit-ID of the Keyword Repository

kw_repo_all_drivers.tooltip: When set to 'yes', all drivers in the Keyword Repository would be cloned

kw_repo_driver_name.tooltip: Name of the driver that you want to clone

kw_repo_clone.tooltip: When set to 'no', this Keyword Repository won't be cloned

kw_repo_overwrite.tooltip: When set to 'yes', the existing files would get overwritten by the newly cloned ones

ws_repo_label.tooltip: Any Branch, Tag-Name, or Commit-ID of the Warriorspace Repository

ws_repo_clone.tooltip: When set to 'no', this Warriorspace Repository won't be cloned

ws_repo_overwrite.tooltip: When set to 'yes', the existing files would get overwritten by the newly cloned ones
